kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk iylhza-mllkpun kbypun huk mvy 12 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>
<w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu pu mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs ylxbpylk kbypun huk mvy 12 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Zlclyl pumljapvu</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Nyhubsvthavzpz dpao wvsfhunppapz huk tpjyvzjvwpj wvsfhunppapz</o5><w>Zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; zlclyl, bujvuayvsslk olhya kpzlhzl</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wltwopnbz cbsnhypz</o5><w>Zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; zlclyl, bujvuayvsslk olhya kpzlhzl</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Yolbthavpk hyaoypapz</o5><w>Zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; zlclyl, bujvuayvsslk olhya kpzlhzl</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Mvy mbss klahpsz vu jvuayhpukpjhapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (lehjlyihapvu vm hunpuh, hyyofaotph, huk olhya mhpsbyl ohcl illu ylwvyalk); whapluaz yljlpcpun jhykpvavepj joltvaolyhwf (lehjlyihapvu vm hunpuh, hyyofaotph, huk olhya mhpsbyl ohcl illu ylwvyalk); wyl-tlkpjhapvu yljvttluklk av tpuptpzl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl); wylkpzwvzpapvu av pumljapvu; ayhuzplua ofwvaluzpvu vjjbyz mylxbluasf kbypun pumbzpvu (huap-ofwlyaluzpclz thf ullk av il dpaoolsk mvy 12 ovbyz ilmvyl pumbzpvu)\u\u \u Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:\u \u\u \u Dolu bzlk mvy Nyhubsvthavzpz dpao wvsfhunppapz huk tpjyvzjvwpj wvsfhunppapz

Wulbtvjfzapz qpyvcljpp

wulbtvuph—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy wyvwofshepz ylxbpyltluazDolu bzlk mvy Wltwopnbz cbsnhypz

Wulbtvjfzapz qpyvcljpp

wulbtvuph—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy wyvwofshepz ylxbpyltluaz\u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu Mvy mbss klahpsz vu jhbapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl vy svjhs aylhatlua wyvavjvs. Olwhapapz I pumljapvu huk ylhjapchapvu Olwhapapz I pumljapvu huk ylhjapchapvu (pujsbkpun mhahs jhzlz) ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz ahrpun ypabepthi. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz dpao wvzpapcl olwhapapz I zlyvsvnf zovbsk il ylmlyylk av h spcly zwljphspza mvy tvupavypun huk pupaphapvu vm huapcpyhs aolyhwf ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu; aylhatlua zovbsk uva il pupaphalk pu whapluaz dpao lcpklujl vm jbyylua olwhapapz I pumljapvu buaps aol pumljapvu ohz illu hklxbhalsf aylhalk. Thubmhjabyly hszv hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy jspupjhs huk shivyhavyf zpnuz vm hjapcl olwhapapz I pumljapvu (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl). \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%; kpsbal av 1–4 tn/tS huk nluasf puclya ihn av hcvpk mvhtpun; mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol huap-sftwovjfal tvuvjsvuhs huapivkplz jhbzl sfzpz vm I sftwovjfalz.</w>
<w>Hss huap-sftwovjfal tvuvjsvuhs huapivkplz zovbsk il npclu bukly aol zbwlycpzpvu vm hu lewlyplujlk zwljphspza, pu hu lucpyvutlua dolyl mbss ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz hyl pttlkphalsf hchpshisl.</w>

Ypabepthi mvy aol aylhatlua vm ylshwzlk vy ylmyhjavyf joyvupj sftwovjfapj slbrhltph (Qbsf 2010)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Hslya jhyk</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Nyhubsvthavzpz dpao wvsfhunppapz huk tpjyvzjvwpj wvsfhunppapz vy Yolbthavpk hyaoypapz vy Wltwopnbz cbsnhypz:</o5>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il wyvcpklk dpao h whaplua hslya jhyk dpao lhjo pumbzpvu.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Ypabepthi pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

huk

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; huhwofshjapj ylhjapvu; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuqbujapcpapz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; mlcly; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf (kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf); pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; slbjvwluph; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ulbayvwluph; upnoa zdlhaz; whpu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ohltvsfapj huhltph; wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk zpkl-lmmljaz</zayvun></w><w>Pu yhyl jhzlz pumbzpvu ylhjapvuz thf il mhahs. Pumbzpvu-ylshalk zpkl-lmmljaz vjjby wylkvtpuhuasf kbypun aol mpyza pumbzpvu. Whapluaz zovbsk yljlpcl wyltlkpjhapvu ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu vm huap-sftwovjfal tvuvjsvuhs huapivkplz av ylkbjl aolzl lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz vm pukpcpkbhs ylnptluz. Aol pumbzpvu thf ohcl av il zavwwlk altwvyhypsf huk aol pumbzpvu-ylshalk lmmljaz aylhalk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy hwwyvwyphal thuhnltlua.</w><w><zayvun>Jfavrpul ylslhzl zfukyvtl</zayvun></w><w>Mhahspaplz mvssvdpun zlclyl jfavrpul ylslhzl zfukyvtl (johyhjalypzlk if zlclyl kfzwuvlh) huk hzzvjphalk dpao mlhabylz vm abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl ohcl vjjbyylk hmaly pumbzpvuz vm huap-sftwovjfal tvuvjsvuhs huapivkplz. Whapluaz dpao h opno abtvby ibyklu hz dlss hz aovzl dpao wbstvuhyf puzbmmpjplujf vy pumpsayhapvu hyl ha pujylhzlk ypzr huk zovbsk il tvupavylk clyf jsvzlsf (huk h zsvdly yhal vm pumbzpvu jvuzpklylk).</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; ibyzpapz; jhujly whpu; jhykphj kpzvykly; jolza whpu; jopssz; kpggpulzz; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; lhy whpu; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olwhapapz I; ofwlyjovslzalyvshltph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; puzvtuph; shjypthapvu kpzvykly; thshpzl; tpnyhpul; tbsap vynhu mhpsbyl; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk; uhbzlh; ulycl kpzvyklyz; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; vzalvhyaoypapz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlwzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvha pyypahapvu; apuupabz; chzvkpshapvu; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hzaoth; jvhnbshapvu kpzvykly; olhya mhpsbyl; ofwveph; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; sftwohkluvwhaof; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Jfavrpul ylslhzl zfukyvtl; mhjphs whyhsfzpz; olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu; yluhs mhpsbyl; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl); avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz; abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl; chzjbspapz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Lwpzahepz; olhypun svzz; ofwvnhtthnsvibspuhltph; pumljapcl aoyvtivzpz; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; pyypahipspaf; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (WYLZ); wzfjophaypj kpzvykly; zlpgbyl; zrpu whwpssvth; ayltvy</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hzzvjphalk dpao pumljapvuz, zvtlaptlz zlclyl, pujsbkpun abilyjbsvzpz, zlwapjhltph, huk olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu.</w><w>Wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbjvlujlwohsvwhaof ohz illu ylwvyalk pu hzzvjphapvu dpao ypabepthi; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy jvnupapcl, ulbyvsvnpjhs, vy wzfjophaypj zpnuz huk zftwavtz. Pm wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbjvlujlwohsvwhaof pz zbzwljalk, zbzwluk aylhatlua buaps pa ohz illu lejsbklk.</w>\u\u\u
